Q#23: Does your country have document(s) providing national recommendation(s) on physical activity for 
women during/after pregnancy?
NUMBER OF COUNTRIES PERCENTAGE (%)
Yes 19 35.85
No 22 41.51
No information available 12 22.64
Q#24: Which bodies are responsible for the implementation of the national recommendation(s) on physical 
activity for women during/after pregnancy?
NUMBER OF COUNTRIES PERCENTAGE (%)
Governmental 4 7.55
Professional 1 1.89
Both, governmental and professional 14
